name: places/ChIJ491ho1VYwokRMQiXTxo_p_8
adrFormatAddress: 1550 Broadway, New York, NY 10036, USA

originalText.text:
Very bad attitude from employees. My kids were looking at a souvenir and it fell on the floor.
Had to purchase the broken item. All stores have an amount of products that are contemplated to either break or be stolen.
Should not have to pay for this since it was not intentional. If items break then put in on shelves where people cannot touch.
Never coming back again to this shops. Hope you do not shop as well.

originalText.text:
DO NOT SHOP HERE WITHOUT LOOKING UP RETAIL PRICES!!!!!

Brought my grandson in here for wireless headphones.
They sold him a pair of JBL headphones for $99.00.
The headphones sell for $40.00 on amazon!!!
These people are scammers!!

originalText.text: Got scammed at this place and they deliberately charged triple price for an item. Recognized when I was home. This is intentional cheating on customers. Please avoid.
